column4: anyone: if I "sudo apt-get install libapache-mod-frontpage-mirfak" is it already setup and ready to go?
you could try  "sudo apt-get -s install libapache-mod-frontpage-mirfak" to simulate the install then you see what it will install also.
I already did the install, I was needing to knwo if I had to config anything before using it
Oh that i have no idea about, i just set up my apache with php5 and all was configured for me
